definitions.definition: the space between two lines or surfaces at the point at which they touch each other, measured in degrees:
examples: The interior angles of a square are right angles or angles of 90 degrees.

definitions.definition: not horizontal or vertical, but sloping in one direction:
examples: The picture was hanging at an angle.

definitions.definition: the corner of a building, table, or anything with straight sides
to aim, turn, or position something in a direction that is not horizontal or vertical:
examples: The stage had been steeply angled (= was sloping very noticeably).
